game.name: Easy Bake Pop Cakes
game.description:
It is a proud moment when Gwen gets a chance to bake something. These days more and more people are coming to her and asking for the extremely delicious pop cakes she loves to bake. However, she is looking quite confused how to prepare this recipe in the shortest possible time. Are you ready to help her out in baking pop cakes in good numbers so that she can serve them to more and more people? Also use your unmatched creativity to decorate the pop cakes holder. Good luck girls!

Easy Bake Pop Cakes is an awesome brand new cooking game for girls from the popular “The Easy Bake Cooking Series”. It would be an exciting moment ladies to learn how to prepare a scrumptious Pop Cake on your own in your virtual kitchen. The very first job on your wide tasks list is to gather all the right ingredients along with the needful kitchen tools. Go through the kitchen cabinets or look around in the fridge for the useful ingredients. 

Once you arrange all the right items, start getting prepared your favourite pop cakes with the help of the instructions given to you time to time. Collect the eggs, sugar, baking powder and other useful items. In the next stage of this cool kitchen game, you will have to bake the cake and find out how to make those lovely shaped pop cakes using your own chef skills. After completing the cooking process, also decorate the lip-smacking treats with the decoration items. Play the best cooking game for girls and boys and have fun ladies!
